title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\HiveJob
name: HiveJob
description:
A Cloud Dataproc job for running Apache Hive queries on YARN.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.HiveJob

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getQueryFileUri
methods.description:
The HCFS URI of the script that contains Hive queries.

Generated from protobuf field string query_file_uri = 1;

methods.name: getQueryList
methods.description:
A list of queries.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.dataproc.v1.QueryList query_list = 2;

methods.name: setQueryList
methods.description:
A list of queries.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.dataproc.v1.QueryList query_list = 2;

methods.name: getContinueOnFailure
methods.description:
Optional. Whether to continue executing queries if a query fails.

The default value is false. Setting to true can be useful when executing independent parallel queries.

Generated from protobuf field bool continue_on_failure = 3;

methods.name: setContinueOnFailure
methods.description:

The default value is false. Setting to true can be useful when executing independent parallel queries.

methods.name: getScriptVariables
methods.description:
Optional. Mapping of query variable names to values (equivalent to the Hive command: SET name="value";).

Generated from protobuf field map<string, string> script_variables = 4;

methods.description:
Optional. Mapping of query variable names to values (equivalent to the Hive command: SET name="value";).

methods.name: getProperties
methods.description:
Optional. A mapping of property names and values, used to configure Hive.

Properties that conflict with values set by the Cloud Dataproc API may be overwritten. Can include properties set in /etc/hadoop/conf/*-site.xml, /etc/hive/conf/hive-site.xml, and classes in user code.

Generated from protobuf field map<string, string> properties = 5;

methods.name: setProperties
methods.description:
Optional. A mapping of property names and values, used to configure Hive.

Properties that conflict with values set by the Cloud Dataproc API may be overwritten. Can include properties set in /etc/hadoop/conf/*-site.xml, /etc/hive/conf/hive-site.xml, and classes in user code.

Generated from protobuf field map<string, string> properties = 5;

params.name: var
params.description:
Optional. A mapping of property names and values, used to configure Hive.

Properties that conflict with values set by the Cloud Dataproc API may be overwritten. Can include properties set in /etc/hadoop/conf/*-site.xml, /etc/hive/conf/hive-site.xml, and classes in user code.

methods.name: getJarFileUris
methods.description:
Optional. HCFS URIs of jar files to add to the CLASSPATH of the Hive server and Hadoop MapReduce (MR) tasks. Can contain Hive SerDes and UDFs.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string jar_file_uris = 6;
